title: Software Developer
descriptions: Working to provide automation solutions to business to help cut down on menial work and connect isolated systems
Primarily writing in Rust; also using WebAssembly on the backend.
Full-Stack webdev and systems programming.  I build frontends using TypeScript+React, APIs with Rust/gRPC/PostgreSQL/BigQuery and other tech
Work on low-level optimization for a mission critical component of the system for which performance is critical

title: Software Developer
descriptions: I workd as a full-stack software developer at Stackline, working on their three flagship software offerings.
I used React/Redux on the frontend, fixing bugs and adding new features.  I also contributed to various internal APIs, developer utilities (CI/CD, automated testing, etc.) and other projects.
Fleshed out an extensive testing solution from scratch for all web-facing products testing user interaction via Cypress, API response schema validation, and unit tests.
Led the effort to incrementally migrating the codebase to TypeScript, creating a set of cohesive types shared between the frontend and backend.
Completely re-implemented the main search API (used to query business data for all user-facing services) from scratch.  Re-implemented additional services from existing C# monolith.
Created several tools for internal use, aiding other employees with report generation, data fetching, and task automation.

title: Software Developer
descriptions: Designed and developed software to aid with the collection, processing, and storage of cryptocurrency market data
Constructed a fully automated trading framework for trading on many cryptocurrency exchanges
Designed software applications and prepared documentation for other developers
Set up CI/CD pipelines using CircleCI, Kubernetes/GKE, and managed code reviews and version control

title: Software Developer
descriptions: Stayed on remotely part-time after my internship working on on React applications for clients in the financial sector

title: Software Developer Intern

title: Undergraduate Researcher / Software Developer

title: Undergraduate Researcher / Software Developer
